mapper.select: select count(*) from board where ${selectbox} like '%'||#{find}||'%'
select * from (select rownum numrow, A.* from (select * from board where ${selectbox} like '%'||#{find}||'%' order by b_ref desc, b_step asc) A) where numrow > #{startrow} and numrow <= #{endrow}
mapper.insert: insert into board (b_seq, b_name, b_id, b_title, b_content,b_date,b_ip, b_ref, b_step,b_hit) values ((select coalesce(max(b_seq)+1,1) from board), #{b_name},#{b_id},#{b_title}, #{b_content},#{b_date},#{b_ip}, (select coalesce(max(b_ref)+1,1) from board), #{b_step}, #{b_hit})

insert into board (b_seq,b_id,b_name,b_id, b_title,b_content,b_date,b_ip,b_ref,b_step,b_hit) values ((select coalesce(max(b_seq)+1,1) from board), #{b_id},#{b_name},#{b_id},#{b_title}, #{b_content},#{b_date},#{b_ip}, #{b_ref},1,#{b_hit})
mapper.update: update board set b_hit=b_hit +1 where b_seq=#{b_seq}
